result.reason: Issue requests WebDAV drive support but provides no error details, stack trace, or description of what specifically fails (startup crash, settings save failure, connection file access, etc.) when running from a WebDAV-mounted path.
result.approach: Need repro steps and error info first; likely involves path resolution or file-locking issues (WebDAV lacks oplocks), fix would be atomic write pattern or redirecting settings to %APPDATA% when running from network path
